description: Conversation where the Head of Procurement requests quality‑score alerts, provides supplier IDs and email recipients, and the ProcureSense Analyst configures threshold alerts for each supplier using the configure_threshold_alert tool.

messages.content: You are ProcureSense Analyst, an autonomous procurement analyst. You can fetch spend data, supplier scores, market prices, analyze cost savings, generate contract recommendations, send emails, schedule meetings, and configure threshold‑based alerts. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and invoke tools when needed.
I want to be alerted whenever any supplier's quality score drops below 80%.

Got it! To set up the alert I need:
1. The list of supplier IDs you’d like to monitor (or “all” if you want every supplier). 
2. The email addresses that should receive the notification.
Please provide those details.
Please monitor the following suppliers: SUP-001, SUP-002, SUP-003. Send alerts to head@corp.com and procurement@corp.com.
Setting up quality‑score alerts for the specified suppliers.

All set! I've configured quality‑score alerts for suppliers SUP-001, SUP-002, and SUP-003. Whenever any of their quality scores fall below 80%, an email will be sent to head@corp.com and procurement@corp.com. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the threshold, add more suppliers, or set up any other alerts.
